page.title: 04A Normal Day In Otley.
page.content: P.Gunby of Wrenbeck Drive,Otley,works in a newsagents shop.He gets up at 4.45am and has his breakfast at 5.00am.He travels from Leeds in his car to his shop.He arrives at 6.10am,he opens at 6.30am because he has to sort out the papers for the delivery boys.He closes at 6.00pm.He gets most customers on a Friday.The most popular products are cigarettes and papers.On a typical day R.Harrison gets up at 8.15am,has his breakfast then leaves for school.His lessons at school include Maths,Environmental Studies,French,Science and P.E.He leaves school at 3.30pm and arrives home at 3.45pm.He watches T.V.until his tea.After tea he does his homework and then watches T.V.or calls for his friends.He goes to bed at 11.00pm. By Paul Clayton and David Grooby.
